DOC.brief_summary: Study Title : Arthroscopic rotator interval closure shoulder instability repair - prospective study Objective : To evaluate effect arthroscopic rotator interval closure ( ARIC ) patient recurrent shoulder dislocation undergo arthroscopic bankart repair ( ABR ) term recurrence , rehabilitation function . Hypothesis : 1 . Although Hyperlax patient undergo ABR high incidence recurrent shoulder dislocation without hyperlaxity , add ARIC low recurrent dislocation rate . 2 . Patients arthroscopic bankart repair ( ABR ) ARIC slow gain range motion ( ROM ) within 6 month equal ABR .
DOC.brief_title: Arthroscopic Rotator Interval Closure Shoulder Instability Repair
DOC.criteria: Age 1640 year old Anterior Shoulder instability Hyperlaxity ( general shoulder laxity ) Previous humerus/glenoid fracture large bony `` Bankart '' Previous shoulder operation Adhesive capsulitisHabitual dislocation
